body.para: This option allows you to select and queue Leader Reports to be emailed overnight.

list.li: Select or accept the Enrolment Term and click Process. The system will fill the grid with all classes in the selected term.
Select the classes that you wish to print reports for.
Select the reports from the list required.
Click the button titled, Queue report(s) for email.

body.para: The selected reports for the selected classes will be created and queued. They may be reviewed in Queued Transactional Email.
